x x x x x x x x x x x x x+x {ANŠE}KUR.RA-MEŠ x x+x-ni il-lak-u-ni ina UGU ṭe₃-e-mu ša {1}dal-ta-a TA@v E₂ la u₂-ṣa-a u₃ me-me-ni ina pa-ni-šu₂ la e-rab a-se-me ma-a re-eh-te ma-da-te u₂-pa-har a-ṣa-me-su i-da-na {LU₂}mat-a.a ša pa-ṭu-ru-ni ša ina IGI-ia 30 {ANŠE}KUR.RA-MEŠ a-ta-ṣa re-eh-te UN-MEŠ ina IGI-ia ma-da-te ša {KUR}zak-ru-tu₂ 40 {ANŠE}KUR.RA-MEŠ a-ta-har iq-ṭi₂-bi-u₂ ma-a re-eh-te ma-da-te ni-da-an LUGAL EN a-na {LU₂}GAL-MEŠ liš-pur le-ti-qu ina UGU {URU}ku-lu-man {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} x x x x u₃ šu-nu da-al-hu a-na KUR-šu₂-nu x x x x-e la ket-tu₂ ina UGU LUGAL EN-a i-sap-ru-ni ma-a kit-ri ina ŠA₃-bi e-x x x x x x u₂-ma-a man-nu šu₂-nu kit-ri x x x x x {KUR}x x-a.a-e {KUR}el-li-pi x+x x x x x {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ-šu₂-nu 03 04 lim ni-x x x x x x x x TA@v UGU e-tab-ku x x x x x x x x x e-ta-rab x x x x x x x x x x x x il-lu-ku x x x x x x x x da-mu ša x+x x x x x x x x x SIG₄-MEŠ ni-x+x x x x x x x x x ni-ir-ti-ṣi-pi x x x x x x x x x+x ma-a lal-li-ik x x x x x x ik-ta-la-šu₂ ma-a i-si-ia x x x x x tal-lak LUGAL EN liš-pu-ra a-na {1}x x-ni liš-ul-lu ma-a 03-su x x x-šu₂-nu ket-ti ši-i a-na mi-i-ni x x pil₂-ku-šu₂ u₂-na-a-da x ša LUGAL EN-a šum₂-mu ši-i pil₂-ku ša E₂.GAL pil₂-ku ša me-me-ni i-ba-aš₂-šu₂-u-ni u₃ 30 ti-ik-pi e-mid ep-še-ti an-ni-ti a-na ma-la ša {1}{d}U.GUR-KAR-ir ši-i ina UGU E₂ {1}hu-na-nu i-du-bu-bu a-du E₂ i-ba-šu₂-nu u₂-ma-a ina UGU {URU}kar-{1}MAN-GIN i-da-bu-bu UD-mu la e-te-qe ša ṣa-a-su hi-in-sa-te la i-ga-ra-ni-ni {LU₂}SAG-MEŠ ša MAN ša an-na-ka dul-lu e-pu-šu₂-u-ni u₃ {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ ša i-si-šu₂-nu DU-MEŠ-u-ni x x x x x x x x x x-u-ni
